tests.name: Test 1
tests.run: ./compress -lzw tests/number.txt output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/number.txt

tests.name: Test 2 (random)
tests.run: ./compress -lzw tests/random.txt output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/random.txt

tests.name: Test 3 (1 byte)
tests.run: ./compress -lzw tests/a.txt output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/a.txt

tests.name: Test 4 (aaa)
tests.run: ./compress -lzw tests/aaa.txt output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/aaa.txt

tests.name: Test 5 (pi)
tests.run: ./compress -lzw tests/pi.txt  output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/pi.txt

tests.name: Test 6 (text)
tests.run: ./compress -lzw tests/canterbury/alice29.txt output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/canterbury/alice29.txt

tests.name: Test 7 (html)
tests.run: ./compress -lzw tests/canterbury/cp.html output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/canterbury/cp.html

tests.name: Test 8 (binary)
tests.run: ./compress -lzw tests/canterbury/kennedy.xls output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/canterbury/kennedy.xls

tests.name: Test 9 (binary 2)
tests.run: ./compress -lzw tests/canterbury/ptt5 output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/canterbury/ptt5

tests.name: Test 10 (binary 3)
tests.run: ./compress -lzw tests/canterbury/sum output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/canterbury/sum

tests.name: Test 11 (huffman)
tests.run: ./compress -huffman tests/number.txt output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/number.txt

tests.name: Test 12
tests.run: ./compress -huffman tests/random.txt output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/random.txt

tests.name: Test 13
tests.run: ./compress -huffman tests/a.txt output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/a.txt

tests.name: Test 14
tests.run: ./compress -huffman tests/aaa.txt output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/aaa.txt

tests.name: Test 15
tests.run: ./compress -huffman tests/pi.txt  output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/pi.txt

tests.name: Test 16
tests.run: ./compress -huffman tests/canterbury/alice29.txt output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/canterbury/alice29.txt

tests.name: Test 17
tests.run: ./compress -huffman tests/canterbury/cp.html output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/canterbury/cp.html

tests.name: Test 18
tests.run: ./compress -huffman tests/canterbury/kennedy.xls output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/canterbury/kennedy.xls

tests.name: Test 19
tests.run: ./compress -huffman tests/canterbury/ptt5 output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/canterbury/ptt5

tests.name: Test 20
tests.run: ./compress -huffman tests/canterbury/sum output1 && ./compress -d output1 output2 && cmp -s output2 tests/canterbury/sum
